fifthSection.description: Gataca Studio is the most comprehensive tool on the market to deploy decentralized identity solutions
fifthSection.title: How it works

firstSection.description: Financial services have never been easier to access
firstSection.title: Finance

fourthSection.description: Revolutionizing financial services with decentralized identity solutions
fourthSection.title: Why Gataca

steps.description: Traditional identity verification methods, such as KYC and AML checks, are time-consuming and costly for financial institutions. Moreover, these methods can result in frustrating processes due to errors and false positives. At the same time, users may find the identity verification process difficult and tedious, which can lead them to abandon it entirely
steps.title: Challenge

steps.description: Our secure and compliant identity verification solution removes a substantial barrier to entry for new users and boosts privacy and trust for existing ones in just one click. By streamlining this process, we help financial institutions reduce the time and cost associated with KYC and AML checks while reducing the risk of fraud and boosting conversion rates
steps.title: Solution

list.description: Reduce the time and effort required for identity verification while complying with regulatory requirements with a verifiable KYC credential
list.title: Customer onboarding (Reusable KYC)

list.description: Issue digital certificates to customers, which can be securely stored in their ID wallet. Examples like credit scores or titles of ownership can trigger new revenue models
list.title: Issuance of financial certificates

list.description: Streamline the application processes by accepting verifiable background information such as academic qualifications or salary certificates
list.title: Loan applications

list.description: Verify the identity of customers during payment transactions, reducing the risk of fraud and increasing security
list.title: Secure payment transactions
